name: Flux (Four Tall Guys + 2)
description:
In Flux, the world is populated by small and bright creatures. 

The player can draw a flux that will put them in motion. The fluxes can be intertwined, and thus, create a network that the creatures will navigate. Their movement tends to create a hypnotizing effect, which is a main part of the visual aspect of the game. 

Flux is about drawing, creating movement, contemplating and experimenting.

Note : In this demo of the game, there is no goal besides toying with the fluxes and creatures.
